TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Kinus, title = Kinus, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kinus} }

S.FORM: Kinus Itiniay i Nan'ao Cen no Yilan ko Kinus a niyaro', 60 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 179 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 97% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 174 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 3% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 5 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal 88%, Amis 1%, Truku 2%, Bunun 3%, Paiwan 2%, roma 2%.

Kinos Itiniay i Nan'ao Cen no Yilan ko Kinos a niyaro', 60 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 179 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 97% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 174 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 3% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 5 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal 88%, Amis 1%, Troko 2%, Bonon 3%, Paiwan 2%, roma 2%.
